description:
Tales of the Shire just dropped their latest trailer and we are pouring over it for gameplay and story clues!  

Check out the trailer here: https://youtu.be/8VA0uGtHqQI?si=T_UqotY7wkHRjCze

Tales of the Shire is coming later in 2024 to PS5, XBOX Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, & PC.  Created by @wetaworkshopnz and @PrivateDivision .

#talesoftheshire #lordoftherings #gaming
title: Tales of the Shire Announcement Trailer BREAKDOWN
